snippet: For-profit colleges would lose all federal student aid, a fatal blow, if their students fail tests of earnings and debt default, the Obama administration will propose Friday.
abstract: Obama administration will propose rule that for-profit colleges lose all federal student aid, a fatal blow, if their students fail tests of earnings and debt default.
lead_paragraph: For-profit colleges would lose all federal student aid, a fatal blow, if their students fail tests of earnings and debt default, the Obama administration will propose Friday.

headline.main: For-Profit Schools Face New Default Rules
headline.print_headline: For-Profit Schools Face New Default Rules
